name: Cacti Club
description:
Do you have what it takes to be a part of the Elite Cacti Club? To prove yourself eligible for it, you must whack as many as MeatBots as you can with your Cactus Club. A club made from Genetically Modified Cactus whose needles are made of Keratin making them as hard as human fingernails.

Note: I've used Godot v3.1b3 to develop this game initially as a part of Godot Wild Jam but it turns out I've missed the deadline but I still uploaded because it was fun. By using the beta version of this engine the sound wonks out randomly, sorry for that I'm new to Godot.
